document_data.name: ''De'Arnise Signet Ring''
document_data.mainbody: '''''De'Arnise signet rings''''' were [[enchanted]] [[ring]]s worn by the members of the [[Arnise]] noble family in [[Amn]] and bounded to them by blood.
document_data.Powers: These signets were imbued with a variety of protective magics. It shielded the wearer with a ''+2'' defensive enchantment, gave them resistance to magical and humane flames, and improved chances of recovering or sharking off effects, afflictions, and increased reaction.
document_data.History: ''De'Arnise signet rings'' were given out to members of the Arnise family when they reached adulthood. In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], one such ring was gifted to a one-time companion of [[Abdel Adrian]], [[Nalia de'Arnise]], by her father as she became an adult. She never parted with the ring.
